# Mermaid Diagram

```mermaid
graph TD
    A[Start] --> B{Decision}
    B -->|Yes| C[Do something]
    B -->|No| D[Do something else]
    C --> E[End]
    D --> E
```

## Sequence Diagram

```mermaid
sequenceDiagram
    Client->>Server: Request
    Server->>Database: Query
    Database-->>Server: Result
    Server-->>Client: Response
```
